wishwawidyalayiya wruththiya samithi eekabaddha kamituwe sama sabhapathiwarun wana pi.ech.di.es priyantha, em.di dabarera, sama lekamwarun wana janaka wimalasuriya, pi.ke ruwan kumara yana mahathwarunge athsanin yuthuwa wishwawidyala prathipadana komishan sabhawe sabhapathiwarayata yomu karana lada lipiye meseda dakweyi. 2016 rajya aya-waya yojana walata anuwa nikuth karana lada kalamanakarana sewa departhamenthu chaka්ralekha 4/2016 magin wishwawidyala watup piliyela kirimedi wishwawidyala watup kappadu kirima thulin nirmanaya wi athi wishamathawa pilibandawa 2019.07.15 ha 2019.08.23 dinathi lipi magin sawistharathmakawa karunu pahadili kara athi athara ehi pitapath athigaru janadhipathithuma, garu aga්ramathyathuma, garu nagara salasum, jala sampadana ha usas adhyapana amathyathuma ha mudal amathyansha niladharin athulu 17 deneku wetha pitapath yomu karamin danuwath kara atha.

ee nisawenma, ee thula gabwa athi hara paddhathiya madhya sadacharaya osse meheyawamin, yatharthaya udesa danuwath bahutharayak bihikirime mahangi karya bharayaka me wana wita deshiya madhyakaruwa niratha wi siti.kalantharayak thisse sidukala yudha puwath warthakaranayen nidahaswa, prabala sanwardhana sanniwedana kriyawaliyaka purwa nimiththa bawata hambanthota waraya wyapruthiya pathwiya.ehidi sarthaka sanwardhana sanniwedana kriyawaliyaka harayathmaka bawa janathawa wetha sanwadathmakawa langakaramin, owunge aakalpa ha drushtin nawamu mawathakata gena, mema wyapruthiye wadagathkama wisheshayen ma, ema pradeshaye janatha sithsathan hi muluganwa owunge dayakathwaya da sarthakawa eeta ekkirimata deshiya madhya wisin itu kala meheya prashansaniya weyi.aarthika unnathiyaewan sadkarya bharayak osse anagatha shri lankeya samaja aarthika unnathiya udesa hambanthota waraya sanwardhana wyapruthiya arambai da sita me dakwa deshiya widyuth ha mudritha madhyayan magin ee pilibandawa laba dun dhanathmaka pracharaya shri lankika prajawa ee pilibandawa mana se danuwath karamin, mema wyapruthiya ehi sarthakathwaya wetha ragena giya gamaka balawegayak wiya.shri lanka waraya adhikariye sanniwedana ha mahajana sambandhatha kottasaye sita widyuth ha mudritha madhyaya samanga sidu kala boho sambandhikarana katayuthuwaladi pasak wu suwisheshi karunak wuye hambanthota waraya sanwardhana wyapruthiya pilibandawa deshiya madhyakaruwa dakwu niranthara unanduwayi.wyapruthiye itha thiranathmaka awasthawanhi di ee pilibanda itha danuwath, harawath wisheshanga madhya osse idiripath kirimatath atham thanaka wu awadharanaya kala yuthu karunu madahathwa penwa dimatath ohu samawitama idiripath wiya.in nonawathi, sama witama hambanthota waraya sanwardhana wyapruthiya pilibanda aayathanika washayen sampadanaya wu puwath wisheshanga ha prathiposhana sandaha da siya madhya jalayan ha puwathpath osse nomasuru awakasha laba dimata tharam apa widyuth ha mudritha madhya eda medathura apa samanga katayuthu kala aakaraya da me mohothe agayiya yuththeya.wisheshayen ma anthagami batahira balawegayanta nathuwa atham goliya madhya meheyawena wakawanuwaka deshaye samaja, aarthika subasiddhiya udesa idiwana dawantha sanwardhana wyapruthiyak wu hambanthota waraya pilibandawa niwaradi yatharthayak lowa hamuwata gena yamata haki wuye da deshiya janamadhya kshethraya mehidi sidu kala athimahath mehewara nisawen bawa kisiseth amathaka kala nohaka.athdakimdurasthawa sita wimasa puwath palakaranawa wenuwata kshethrayehi sita, lada palamu pela athdakim osse hambanthota waraya sanwardhana wyapruthiya lowata idiripath kirimata apa madhyakaruwa dakwu prawanathawaya mehidi kapi penunu thawath suwisheshi lakshanayak wiya.
